title: Working at Wal-Mart
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description:
Today, we meet Adam Reich from Columbia University. Adam recently co-published Working for Respect: Community and Conflict at Wal-Mart with Peter Bearman, a book about the working conditions and labor organization efforts at one of America's biggest retailers.

Photo Credit

By User: (WT-shared) Stilfehler at wts wikivoyage, CC BY-SA 1.0, Link
